quoteText: We use a number of third party analytics and service providers (such as Google Analytics) to help us evaluate our users' use of Bitwarden. compile statistical reports on activity. and improve our content and website performance.
title: This service gathers information about you through third party analytics and service providers (such as Google Analytics)

tosdr.case: This service gathers information about you through third parties
tosdr.tldr: From the Privacy Policy, "We use a number of third party analytics and service providers (such as Google Analytics) to help us evaluate our users' use of Bitwarden; compile statistical reports on activity; and improve our content and website performance. In addition, we use our own internal analytics software to provide features and improve our content and performance."
